mapper.select: select name from user where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into board(id, name, title, content, regdate, readcount, replycount) value(#{id},#{name},#{title},#{content}, now(), 0, 0)

insert into boardfile(bno, orginalfilename, storedfilepath, filesize) value
(#{bno}, #{orginalfilename}, #{storedfilepath}, #{filesize})
